channel.title: Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit
channel.description:
My brother get that problem when he is trying to open my client in a jar file. But i am not getting that error. Mine works perfect but not hims... Can you guys help me? Here is a picture of it:
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/11273x3.png[/img]

item.title: Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit
item.dc:creator: @wrrion15 wrrion15
item.description:
@wrrion15 wrote:

[quote=“Brentatechnologies, post:2, topic:428035”]This may sound stupid but…
When I was starting my server I hadn’t redirected my compiler to the appropriate Jdk(sent it to the program files x86) instea of normal… Almost the same error

Or your missing something from the cache possibly?[/quote]

No nothing is missing in the cache

Read full topic
item.source: Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit
